name: SIS
overview:
SIS is a company specialized in web sites, multi-media products, networks and information technology consulting.

It was founded in 2005 by two young web masters and since then it has always increased its activity, enlarged its skills, doubled its turnover every year and kept new customers. Focusing attention on innovation and new technologies, SIS has steadily widened the range of its products and services.

Also in the last recessionary year, the economic results of the company were satisfactory: this is due also to the cooperation with new international partners with whom SIS is now involved in larger plans and projects.

SIS is a solid company and can rely on a qualified and knit team: their different skills ensure to find the right solution for small firms and large corporations and the close teamwork among them makes possible a common approach and shared choices. The first aim of the group is to understand the deep needs of the customer and give a tailor made, unique and qualified solution that enable him to reach his goals and go ahead.

The SIS working style is to start from the analysis of the environment in which the client is, to find the more suitable tools to increase his business, to set the best strategies and follow the applications; finally, to value the potential developments.

A tree is the symbol that represents this method best: find the right location, take care of the shoots to make them develop healthy, strong and beautiful, to reach eventually the spread of new young plants.

This is the philosophy of the activity of SIS united to the attention to costs: the final result is a product that is reliable at competitive prices.
